name: Crazy Scribe's Adventure
description:
Help young Abbadon, a novice just joining Jahannam Abbey, to save his brothers. The Demon Mephistopheles just tricked the Monks to surrender their souls, leaving  Abbadon as the only survivor. It is then Archangel Uriel picks him up to fight the evil that has taken the abbey and its underground crypts, charging young Abbadon with the task to recover his brethren's lost souls.

This is a proof of concept for now, basic movement and physics are in place but things like screen boundaries or object pick up are not implemented.  I started the project's page as this is part of RNDGAMEII Jam and to start gathering feedback.
